rdf:Description.rdfs:label: identifiedPerson
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: To be deleted, only in MediaWiki.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: HostingConditionType
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The type of hosting condition.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Contrat
Contract
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A legal agreement between parties that set up the conditions of an employment. In the Garzoni project, this corresponds to an apprenticeship contract between a master and an apprentice with, often, the caution of a guarantor.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Patronymic2
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Part of the name of a person which refers to one of his/her relative. In (former) Italian family names, the patronymic is preceded by the word "di" or "quondam", e.g. "Federico Di Garla". "Di" stands for "figlio/figlia di" or "marito/moglie di" meaning the son/daughter or husband/wife of a living person. "Quondam" means the same but for a person who ceased to live.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: period
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The period during which something happens.
This property allows to specific the geographical origins of a PersonMention or PersonEntity.
The relation between a PersonMention or PersonEntity and a Workshop.
This property allows to state the profession of a PersonMention or PersonEntity.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ProfessionMention
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The mention of the profession of a person.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ApplicationRule
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The definition of the conditions under which a rule applies.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: mediaWikiReference
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: This property allows to link a contract to its corresponding object contract in the former MediaWiki database.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: PersonAppellation
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The name of a person entity.
This property allows to relate the different parts of a contract spanning over 2 pages.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Patronyme1
Patronym1
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Part of the name of a person which refers to one of his/her immediate relative. In (former) Italian family names, the patronymic is preceded by the word "di" or "quondam", e.g. "Federico Di Garla". "Di" stands for "figlio/figlia di" or "marito/moglie di" meaning the son/daughter or husband/wife of a living person. "Quondam" means the same but for a person who ceased to live.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Condition
Condition
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Any condition or terms stated in a apprenticeship contract.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Pr√©nom
Firstname
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The firstname of a person.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ChargeMention
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The mention of a Charge.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ageText
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: To be deleted, only in MediaWiki

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: CurrencyType
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The type of currency.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: WorkshopMention
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The mention of a workshop.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: clothingType
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An indication on the type of clothes which is being paid to an apprentice.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: site
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: This property allows to state a complementary information relative to the location of a worshop.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: PlaceType
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The type of place.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Composant d'appellation
AppellationComponent
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: This class defines elements which compose the appellation, or name, of an entity.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: SingleSalary
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: In a professional contractual setting, a fixed regular payment due by an employer to an employee.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: hasMargin
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: This property allows to state whether a contract, in the register where it is written, has a complementary note in the margin or not.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: BreachofContract
Rupture de contrat
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An event which corresponds to the breaking of a contract.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Periodization
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The regular time period at which something happens.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Master
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A role or function which a person has while being a master duting an apprenticship.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Nom collectif
Collectivename
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: In Garzoni context, this class covers expressions used to refer to collective entities. Typical examples include: "et fratelli" (and brothers), "e fioli", "et sua consorte" .

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Fugue
Flee
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An event which corresponds to the flee of an apprentice during its apprenticeship.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: details
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: This property allows to state additionnal details about whatever.
This property allows to specify the residence of a PersonMention or PersonEntity.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Apprentissage
Apprenticeship
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An event which corresponds to the execution of an apprenticeship.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: PeriodizationType
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The type of periodization; in garzoni context, this is used to specify at which intervals the salary is paid.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Charge
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A public responsibility hold by a person, usually different from his/her profession.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: denunciationDate
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: This property allows to state at which date a flee has been denounced.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: hasName
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: This property is used to attribute a PersonAppellation to a PersonMention or a PersonEntity.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: moneyInformation
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Additional information about money, if necessary.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Atelier
Workshop
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The place where objects are crafted or manufactured. In garzoni context, the place were the training of the apprentice was taking place.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: HostingCondition
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The contract's terms relative to hosting, i.e. some benefit in kind.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: currencyUnit
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: To be deleted when harmonization with Wiki fully done.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: worksFor
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: This allow to state an additional information related to a ProfessionMention.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: PayerType
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The type of payer; in garzoni context, this is used to specify who is paying the apprenticeship: the apperntice to the master (emphasize on training), or the master to the apprentice (emphasize on employing).

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Guarantor
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A role or function that a person has while being a guarantor in the context of an apprenticeship.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: quondam2
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: This property allows to state the status of the second quondam information in an Appellation.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Enrolment
Inscription
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An event which corresponds to the enrolment of an apprenticship. In the Garzoni project, it corresponds to the registration of the contract at the institution of the Giustizia Vecchia.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: FinancialCondition
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The financial terms of a contract.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: onMultiplePages
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: This property allows to state whether a contract spans over 2 pages or not.

rdf:Description.rdfs:isDefinedBy: This property specifies the role of a PersonMention or PersonEntity.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: hasLocation
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: This property allows to specify the location of an entity

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: partialAmount
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The partial amount of a progressive salary.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: quondam1
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: This property allows to state the status of the first quondam information in an Appellation. If 'di', then false, otherwise true.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: FinancialConditionType.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The type of financial condition.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: RoleType
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The type of role.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Surname
Nom de famille
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The surname or family name of a person entity.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Other
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An undetermined role or function taht a person has.
This property allows to state the specific type of a financial or hosting condition.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: applicationRule
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: This property allows to state the condition under which a rule is applied.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: oid
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: This property allows to state the object id of the mongo database (only valid for data coming from MediaWiki, should disappear.)

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: This property allows to assign a charge to a PersonMention or a PersonEntity.
Apprentice
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A role or function which a person has when being enrolled as apprentice during an apprenticeship.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: insigna
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: This property allows to state the emblem or 'name' of a workshop.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Profession
Profession
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Activity in which someone is skilled and which is carries out in order to make a living. Occupation.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: This property allows to assign a condition to a garzoni contract.
EventType
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The type of event.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Garzoni Ontology
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An ontology which models the information contained in the archival series "Accordi dei Garzoni" of the Venetian State Archives, relative to early modern venetian apprenticeship domain.
